The Janaswaraj Party () is a Nepalese political party. The party led by Dipak Shah was formed after a split in Janamat Party, criticizing the authoritarian leadership of CK Raut and his brother Jay Kant Raut.
The party was later joined by members of  Madhesh Provincial Assembly including chief minister of Madhesh province Satish Kumar Singh and minister Tribhuwan Sah.
